alert.note: Alert for Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 7:58PM CDT until October 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROGERS...MAYES...NORTHEASTERN WAGONER AND NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 758 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Pryor to 6 miles southeast of Chouteau to 3 miles north of Wagoner, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Wagoner... Pryor... Pryor Creek... Chouteau... Locust Grove... Salina... Adair... Hoot Owl... Peggs... Rose... Spavinaw State Park... Sportsmen Acres Community... Strang... Mazie... Snowdale State Park... Murphy... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 257 and 262. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
